issue.title: [C++] Do not build with ARROW_COMPUTE=on and ARROW_DATASET=on by default
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6632](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6632). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In addition to being more time-consuming to build, some "core" users will not need these functions, so it would be better to opt in to these
